Class PostgresSharingDAO

java.lang.Object
daopostgresimplementation.PostgresSharingDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
SharingDAO
public class PostgresSharingDAO extends Object implements SharingDAO

PostgreSQL specific implementation of the SharingDAO interface.

      Loads a User's shared ToDos in each appropriate Noticeboard.

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      userID - the User's ID
      boards - a List object to load the Noticeboard objects into
      Returns:
      0 if successful, otherwise -1.
